verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> thee a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> thou shalt <S%H1696>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> ye a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> and a <S%H5695>calf<s%> and a <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> both of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%>

Also a <S%H7794>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you.

And they <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that ye should <S%H6213>do:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H7126>Go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and thy burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> thyself, and <S%H1157>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> them; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

Aaron <S%H175><s%> therefore <S%H7126>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for himself.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him: and he <S%H2881>dipped<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and poured <S%H3332>out<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

But the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H5785>hide<s%> he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And he <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>presented<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> which he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And they <S%H4672>presented<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, with the <S%H5409>pieces<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7218>head:<s%> and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
And he did <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people's<s%> <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> it, and offered it for <S%H2398>sin,<s%> as the <S%H7223>first.<s%>
And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H6213>offered<s%> it according to the <S%H4941>manner.<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and took a <S%H4390>handful<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H4480>thereof,<s%> and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

He <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> the <S%H7794>bullock<s%> and the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>presented<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> which he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%>

And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7794>bullock<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H451>rump,<s%> and that which <S%H4374>covereth<s%> the inwards, and the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the liver: <S%H3516><s%>
And they <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2373>breasts,<s%> and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And the <S%H2373>breasts<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>waved<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>offering<s%> <S%H6213><s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And there came a fire <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H784><s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat:<s%> which when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> they <S%H7442>shouted,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>
